column4: im about to download the ubuntu server, my machine is a 32 bit machine, should i get that?  it says 64 is recommended for most machines and Im not sure if it means all 64 bit machines only
32 bit OS will work just fine on a 64 bit machine but 64 bit OS will NOT work on a 32 bit machine.  If you don't have 4+Gb of ram 64 bit does not have many more advantages.
That's a perfect idea.  Although you don't necessarily need the server install.
